creator: pnusse@gacq.com
text:
the WAR task puts the "web.xml" in the "web-inf" (note the lowercase), but the
"lib" in "WEB-INF/lib" (with uppercase) and "classes" in "WEB-INF/classes".

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
Did you discover this using WinZip perhaps?

http://ant.apache.org/faq.html#winzip-lies
